description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林彪之妻。曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军委办事组成员等职。在文化大革命期间被认为是林彪、江青反革命集团案的主犯之一，于1971年在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the wife of Lin Biao. She served as a member of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the CCP and a member of the Administrative Group of the Central Military Commission. Considered one of the principal culprits in the Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-Revolutionary Cliques during the Cultural Revolution, she died in a plane crash during the September 13 Incident in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，叶群的丈夫。在九一三事件中与叶群一同身亡。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China and the husband of Ye Qun. He died alongside Ye Qun in the September 13 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与叶群的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Lin Biao and Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与叶群的次子。在九一三事件中与父母一同身亡。
description.en: The second son of Lin Biao and Ye Qun. He died alongside his parents in the September 13 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的一个特殊行政区，位于今北京市。叶群的出生地。
description.en: A special administrative area during the mainland period of the Republic of China, located in present-day Beijing. It is the birthplace of Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古人民共和国肯特省的地名，叶群的逝世地。
description.en: A location in Khentii Province, Mongolian People's Republic, and the place of Ye Qun's death.

nodes.id: 北京师范大学附属中学

zh-cn: 北京师范大学附属中学
国立北平师范大学附属中学校

description.zh-cn: 叶群曾就读的中学。
description.en: The high school that Ye Qun attended.

description.zh-cn: 1935年在中国北平爆发的一场学生爱国运动，叶群曾参与其中。
description.en: A patriotic student movement that broke out in Beiping, China in 1935, in which Ye Qun participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的青年组织。
description.en: The youth organization of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期进行的思想和政治运动，叶群在此期间受到冲击。
description.en: An ideological and political campaign conducted by the Chinese Communist Party in Yan'an, during which Ye Qun was criticized.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一场政治运动，叶群在此期间担任要职，是其政治生涯的高峰期。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which Ye Qun held important positions, marking the peak of her political career.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间设立的全军性领导机构，叶群曾任成员、副组长。
description.en: A military-wide leading body established during the Cultural Revolution, where Ye Qun served as a member and deputy leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest national military command and control institution of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第九次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第九次全国代表大会
en: 9th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，叶群在此次会议上当选为中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: A national congress of the Chinese Communist Party where Ye Qun was elected as a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪、叶群、林立果等人乘机出逃并于蒙古温都尔汗坠机身亡的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao, Ye Qun, Lin Liguo, and others attempted to flee by plane and crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia, resulting in their deaths.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
en: Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-Revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 对林彪集团和江青集团在“文化大革命”中所犯罪行进行审判的案件。叶群被该案确认为主犯之一。
description.en: The case concerning the trial for crimes committed by the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing cliques during the 'Cultural Revolution.' Ye Qun was identified as one of the principal culprits in this case.

description.zh-cn: 叶群于1943年与林彪结婚。
description.en: Ye Qun married Lin Biao in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是叶群的长女。
description.en: Lin Lih-en is the eldest daughter of Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 林立果是叶群的次子。
description.en: Lin Liguo is the second son of Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是林彪的长女。
description.en: Lin Lih-en is the eldest daughter of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 林立果是林彪的次子。
description.en: Lin Liguo is the second son of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 叶群出生于京兆地方。
description.en: Ye Qun was born in Jingzhao.

relationships.target: 北京师范大学附属中学

description.zh-cn: 1935年，叶群在北京师范大学附属中学读书。
description.en: In 1935, Ye Qun was studying at The High School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 叶群在北平师范大学附属中学读书时参加了“一二·九”学生运动。
description.en: While studying at The High School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University, Ye Qun participated in the 'December 9th' student movement.

description.zh-cn: 叶群于1935年加入中国共产主义青年团，并于1936年转入中国共产党。
description.en: Ye Qun joined the Communist Youth League of China in 1935 and transferred to the Chinese Communist Party in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 叶群于1936年加入中国共产党，后于1973年8月20日被中共中央永远开除党籍。
description.en: Ye Qun joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1936 and was permanently expelled from the party by the CCP Central Committee on August 20, 1973.

description.zh-cn: 叶群在延安整风运动期间受到过冲击。
description.en: Ye Qun was criticized during the Yan'an Rectification Movement.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命为叶群提供了政治机遇，使其担任了全军文革小组副组长、中央军委办事组成员、中共中央政治局委员等要职。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution provided political opportunities for Ye Qun, allowing her to hold key positions such as deputy leader of the All-Army Cultural Revolution Group, member of the Administrative Group of the Central Military Commission, and member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，叶群担任了全军文革小组的成员和副组长。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ye Qun served as a member and deputy leader of the All-Army Cultural Revolution Group.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，叶群担任了中央军委办事组成员。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Ye Qun served as a member of the Administrative Group of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第九次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1969年，叶群在中国共产党第九次全国代表大会上当选为中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: In 1969, Ye Qun was elected as a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee at the 9th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 叶群自1969年起担任中共中央政治局委员，直至其在1971年去世。
description.en: Ye Qun served as a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee from 1969 until her death in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 叶群在九一三事件中因飞机失事而身亡。
description.en: Ye Qun died in a plane crash during the September 13 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中因飞机失事而身亡。
description.en: Lin Biao died in a plane crash during the September 13 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 林立果在九一三事件中因飞机失事而身亡。
description.en: Lin Liguo died in a plane crash during the September 13 Incident.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1973年8月20日，中共中央决定永远开除叶群的党籍，并撤销其党内的一切职务。
description.en: On August 20, 1973, the CCP Central Committee decided to permanently expel Ye Qun from the party and remove all her posts within the party.

relationships.source: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 1981年1月25日，中华人民共和国最高人民法院特别法庭确认叶群为林彪、江青反革命集团案的主犯，但鉴于其已死亡，不予追究刑事责任。
description.en: On January 25, 1981, the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China confirmed Ye Qun as a principal culprit in the Case of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-Revolutionary Cliques, but given that she was already deceased, no criminal responsibility was pursued.
